nodes.text: By 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry fought a battle on Cartao, a terrestrial astronomical object in the Expansion Region. While on the planet Sullust in 3 ABY, Hazram Namir, the acting captain of the 61st, asked the chief of engineering Vifra if she had been present for the battle on Cartao. When the engineer told him she had not, Namir promised to tell her about the battle another time.
The battle of Cartao was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
